metadata.title: USN-5559-1 -- Moment.js vulnerabilities
metadata.description: It was discovered that Moment.js incorrectly handled certain input paths. An  attacker could possibly use this issue to cause a loss of integrity by  changing the correct path to one of their choice. (CVE-2022-24785)  It was discovered that Moment.js incorrectly handled certain input. An attacker  could possibly use this issue to cause a denial of service. (CVE-2022-31129)  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5559-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  node-moment - 2.29.1+ds-3ubuntu0.2 libjs-moment - 2.29.1+ds-3ubuntu0.2 No subscription required
